title: Cellulite & Stubborn Fat Reduction
description: Bespoke injectable cocktails combining fat-dissolving enzymes, polynucleotides, and collagen stimulators to contour thighs, hips, and abdomen.
longDescription: Dr. SNA blends deoxycholate, mesotherapy vitamins, and polynucleotides to shrink stubborn fat cells while tightening overlying skin. This dual-action approach makes dimples fade, improves circulation, and sculpts smoother contours without surgery.

seo.metaTitle: Cellulite & Fat Reduction Injections London | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: Custom injectable cocktails break down stubborn fat, improve circulation, and smooth cellulite. Minimal downtime body contouring in Marylebone.

hero.headline: Targeted Smoothing That Works
hero.subheadline: Precision injections shrink pockets of fat and rebuild collagen for velvet skin.

overview.title: How We Customise Each Session
overview.content: After pinch testing and photography we map each dimple and fat pocket. Deoxycholate melts fat cells, while polynucleotides and biostimulants tighten septae and improve microcirculation. Lymphatic massage completes the visit.
highlights: Treat thighs, hips, abdomen, upper arms
Supports lymphatic drainage and skin tone

items.title: Dual Action
items.description: Shrinks fat cells and tightens skin simultaneously.

items.title: Custom Blend
items.description: Formulas mixed per area and severity.

steps.title: Assessment
steps.description: Pinch test, photos, and plan creation.

steps.title: Inject & Blend
steps.description: Micro injections + cannula threads target fat and fibrous bands.

steps.title: Drain & Support
steps.description: Lymphatic massage advice, supplements, and follow-up scheduling.

faq.question: Will I need time off?
faq.answer: You can resume office work immediately. Expect swelling and tenderness for 3-5 days.

faq.question: Is it suitable for all body types?
faq.answer: Best for pinchable fat and cellulite grades 1-3. We advise if alternative treatments are better.
